name: Don't Embarrass yourself
description:
You are an office worker. Try to maintain as much dignity as possible in the open space by completing all your tasks throughout the day.

Made in 48 hours.

Controls:

Left mouse button to action.

Credits:

Kim Cysique &  Néo Grapin : Game Design, Programming

Lancelot Larcher & Anaïs Mureddu : Art
